scriptedContentFragment.name: Cookie Information Banner
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
<script type="text/javascript" src="$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($core_v2_widget.GetFileUrl('cookiebanner.js'))"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($core_v2_widget.GetFileUrl('cookiebanner.css'))" />

<script>
window.addEventListener("load", function(){
window.cookieconsent.initialise({
  "palette": {
    "popup": {
      "background": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_BackgroundColor', '#2196F3')",
      "text": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_TextColor', '#FFF')"
    },
    "button": {
      "background": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_ButtonColor', '#FFF')",
      "text": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_ButtonTextColor', '#2196F3')"
    }
  },
  "position": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_Position', 'bottom')",
  "content": {
    "message": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_Message', 'This website uses cookies to make your browsing experience better.  By using our site you agree to our use of cookies.')",
    "dismiss": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_ButtonText', 'Accept!')",
    "link": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkText', 'Learn More')",
    "href": "$core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkHref', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_cookie')"
  }
})});
</script>
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="bannerOptions" resourceName="Options"> <property id="CookieBanner_Title" resourceName="CookieBanner_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:CookieBanner_TitleValue}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="CookieBanner_BackgroundColor" resourceName="CookieBanner_BackgroundColor" dataType="string" defaultValue="#2196F3" /> <property id="CookieBanner_TextColor" resourceName="CookieBanner_TextColor" dataType="string" defaultValue="#FFF" /> <property id="CookieBanner_ButtonColor" resourceName="CookieBanner_ButtonColor" dataType="string" defaultValue="#FFF" /> <property id="CookieBanner_ButtonTextColor" resourceName="CookieBanner_ButtonTextColor" dataType="string" defaultValue="#2196F3" /> <property id="CookieBanner_Message" resourceName="CookieBanner_Message" dataType="string" defaultValue="This website uses cookies to make your browsing experience better. By using our site you agree to our use of cookies." /> <property id="CookieBanner_ButtonText" resourceName="CookieBanner_ButtonText" dataType="string" defaultValue="Accept" /> <property id="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkText" resourceName="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkText" dataType="string" defaultValue="Learn More!" /> <property id="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkHref" resourceName="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkHref" dataType="string" defaultValue="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_cookie" /> <property id="CookieBanner_Position" resourceName="CookieBanner_Position" dataType="string" defaultValue="bottom"> <propertyValue value="bottom" resourceName="Position_Bottom" /> <propertyValue value="top" resourceName="Position_Top" /> <propertyValue value="bottom-left" resourceName="Position_BottomLeft" /> <propertyValue value="bottom-right" resourceName="Position_BottomRight" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CookieBanner_BackgroundColor">Banner Background Color (Hex Code - Ex. #2196F3)</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_ButtonColor">Banner Button Color (Hex Code - Ex. #FFFFFF)</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_ButtonText">Banner Button Text</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_ButtonTextColor">Banner Button Text Color (Hex Code - Ex. #2196F3)</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkHref">Learn More Link URL</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_LearnMoreLinkText">Learn More Link Text</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_Message">Banner Text</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_Name">Cookie Banner</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_Position">Location of the banner.</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_TextColor">Banner Text Color (Hex Code - Ex. #FFFFFF)</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_Title">Title of the Widget</resource> <resource name="CookieBanner_TitleValue">Cookie Banner</resource> <resource name="Position_Bottom">Bottom</resource> <resource name="Position_BottomLeft">Bottom Left</resource> <resource name="Position_BottomRight">Bottom Right</resource> <resource name="Position_Top">Top</resource> </language>
